products.title: Baltimore Black (Moisture Resistant)
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm fabric composition: 25% fibreglass/ 75% pvc louvre width: 89mm &amp; 127mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
